con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="GetAvailableEServicesInteraction" targetNamespace="urn:riv:eservicesupply:eoffering:GetAvailableEServices:1:rivtabp21" xmlns:riv="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tjsi="urn:riv:eservicesupply:eoffering:GetAvailableEServicesInitiator:1" xmlns:tjsr="urn:riv:eservicesupply:eoffering:GetAvailableEServicesResponder:1" xmlns:tns="urn:riv:eservicesupply:eoffering:GetAvailableEServices:1:rivtabp21" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd="urn:riv:eservicesupply:eoffering:GetAvailableEServicesResponder:1"> <wsdl:documentation>Tjansteinteraktionens namn: GetAvailableEServicesInteraction Beskrivning: Retrieves a healthcare facilities available e-services. Revisioner: Tjanstedoman: eservicesupply:eoffering Tjansteinteraktionstyp: Fraga-Svar WS-profil: RIVTABP21 Farvaltas av: Inera AB</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="urn:riv:eservicesupply:eoffering:GetAvailableEServices:1:rivtabp21"> <xs:import namespace="urn:riv:eservicesupply:eoffering:GetAvailableEServicesResponder:1" schemaLocation="https://qa.esb.ntjp.sjunet.org:20000/vp/GetAvailableEServices/1/rivtabp21?xsd=GetAvailableEServicesResponder_1.0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1" schemaLocation="https://qa.esb.ntjp.sjunet.org:20000/vp/GetAvailableEServices/1/rivtabp21?xsd=../../core_components/itintegration_registry_1.0.xsd"/> </xs:schema> <xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="urn:riv:eservicesupply:eoffering:GetAvailableEServicesResponder:1" schemaLocation="https://qa.esb.ntjp.sjunet.org:20000/vp/GetAvailableEServices/1/rivtabp21?xsd=GetAvailableEServicesResponder_1.0.xsd"></xsd:import> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="GetAvailableEServicesResponse"> <wsdl:part element="xsd:GetAvailableEServicesResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetAvailableEServicesRequest"> <wsdl:part element="riv:LogicalAddress" name="LogicalAddress"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>LogicalAddress is the standard id for the national service provider: The HSA-id of Carlink.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </wsdl:part> <wsdl:part element="xsd:GetAvailableEServices" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="GetAvailableEServicesResponderInterface"> <wsdl:operation name="GetAvailableEServices"> <wsdl:input message="tns:GetAvailableEServicesRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:GetAvailableEServicesResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="GetAvailableEServicesResponderBinding" type="tns:GetAvailableEServicesResponderInterface"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="GetAvailableEServices"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:riv:eservicesupply:eoffering:GetAvailableEServicesResponder:1:GetAvailableEServices" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="tns:GetAvailableEServicesRequest" part="LogicalAddress" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:body parts="parameters" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="GetAvailableEServicesResponderService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:GetAvailableEServicesResponderBinding" name="GetAvailableEServicesResponderPort"> <soap:address location="https://qa.esb.ntjp.sjunet.org:20000/vp/GetAvailableEServices/1/rivtabp21"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License.--> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:riv:eservicesupply:eoffering:GetAvailableEServicesResponder:1" version="1.0" xmlns:core="urn:riv:eservicesupply:eoffering:1" xmlns:tns="urn:riv:eservicesupply:eoffering:GetAvailableEServicesResponder:1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:import namespace="urn:riv:eservicesupply:eoffering:1" schemaLocation="https://qa.esb.ntjp.sjunet.org:20000/vp/GetAvailableEServices/1/rivtabp21?xsd=../../core_components/eservicesupply_eoffering_1.0.xsd"/> <xs:element name="GetAvailableEServices" type="tns:GetAvailableEServicesType"/> <xs:element name="GetAvailableEServicesResponse" type="tns:GetAvailableEServicesResponseType"/> <xs:complexType name="GetAvailableEServicesType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation/> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="healthcare_facility" type="core:hsaIdType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Vårdenhetens hsa-id</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="GetAvailableEServicesResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="availableEServices" type="tns:availableEServicesType"></xs:element> <xs:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="availableEServicesType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="healthcare_facility" type="core:healthcareFacilityInfoType"></xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="eservice" type="core:eServiceType"/> <xs:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<!--Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more contributor license agreements. See the NOTICE file distributed with this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership. Inera AB licenses this file to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with the License. You may obtain a copy of the License at
http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License.--> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:riv:eservicesupply:eoffering:1" version="1.0" xmlns:tns="urn:riv:eservicesupply:eoffering:1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Beskrivning: Meddelandeformat för eservicesupply:eoffering. Revisioner: 2010-03-17: Release version 1.0 marco.deluca@callistaenterprise.se.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType name="hsaIdType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="eServiceType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>E-tjänst: Informationer om e-tjänsten. En e-tjänst tillhandahålls på elektronisk väg med t.ex. webbläsare(Firefox) eller mobil enhet(mobiltelefon).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="commonName" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>E-tjänstens(resursens) namn.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="description" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Information om e-tjänsten. Kan innehålla beskrivningar och villkor för användandet av tjänsten (riktad mot användare/patient).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="resourceId" type="tns:resourceIdType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>E-tjänstens id. Unikt id för e-tjänsten. Tjänsteproducentens unika id.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="securitylevel" type="tns:securitylevelType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Tjänstens krav på autentiseringsnivå AL (Assurance level/tillitsnivå ISO/IEC 29115).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="url" type="xs:anyURI"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>URL till e-tjänst.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="restrictions" type="tns:restrictionType"></xs:element> <xs:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="restrictionType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Restriktion: Information om de restriktioner som finns kopplade till e-tjänsten. T ex krav på att remiss krävs för att utnyttja tjänsten.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="eserviceAreaCode" type="tns:eServiceAreaCodeType"></xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="gender" type="tns:genderType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>E-tjänsten riktar sig endast till ett visst kön. 1 = Man 2 = Kvinna</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="listing" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>S= Kräver listning F = Kräver ej listning</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="referal" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>S = Kräver remiss F = Kräver ej remiss</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="referalTypeId" type="tns:referalTypeIdType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Definiera vilken typ av remiss e-tjänsten kräver.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ageMin" type="xs:int"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Ålderskrav min.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ageMax" type="xs:int"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Ålder max.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="healthcareFacilityInfoType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Vårdenhet som erbjuder e-tjänster.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="healthcare_facility" type="tns:hsaIdType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Vårdenhetens hsa-id.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="healthcare_facility_name" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Vårdenhetens namn</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="eServiceAreaCodeType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Betjäningsområde: Information om e-tjänstens geografiska betjäningsområde (län, kommun och kommundel)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="countycode" type="tns:countycode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Beskriver inom vilket län e-tjänsten erbjuds. E-tjänsten betjänar invånare i detta län.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="municipalityCode" type="tns:municipalityCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Beskriver inom vilken kommun e-tjänsten erbjuds. E-tjänsten betjänar invånare i denna kommun.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="municipalitySectionCode" type="tns:municipalitySectionCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Beskriver inom vilken kommundelskod e-tjänsten erbjuds. E-tjänsten betjänar invånare i denna kommundel.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="countycode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="municipalityCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="municipalitySectionCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="securitylevelType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Tjänstens krav på autentiseringsnivå (Quality of Autentication Assurance).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="AL1"/> <xs:enumeration value="AL2"/> <xs:enumeration value="AL3"/> <xs:enumeration value="AL4"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="resourceCategoryType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="resourceType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="resourceIdType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="genderType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="referalTypeIdType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1" version="1.0" xmlns="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Beskrivning: Typdefinition för logisk adress som skall användas i tjänstekontrakten från och med RIV-TA Basic Profile 2.1
Revisionshistorik:
Datum: 2011-05-04 Beskrivning: Initial version Författare: marcus.krantz@callistaenterprise.se</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="LogicalAddress" type="LogicalAddressType"/> <xs:simpleType name="LogicalAddressType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1" xmlns:urn1="urn:riv:eservicesupply:eoffering:GetAvailableEServicesResponder:1"> <soapenv:Header> <urn:LogicalAddress>?</urn:LogicalAddress> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn1:GetAvailableEServices> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:healthcare_facility>?</urn1:healthcare_facility> <!--You may enter ANY elements at this point--> </urn1:GetAvailableEServices> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
